smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function reconnect appears to be too complex.
The function draw appears to be too complex.
The function getAppliedValue appears to be too complex.
The function restore appears to be too complex.
The function create appears to be too complex.
The function applyWindowToken appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'ProxyImpl' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'PreferenceImpl' with '48' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'IPreferenceProvider' with '33' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'SharedPreferenceDataStore' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BlurWallpaperProvider' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BlurDrawable' with '21' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BackupListActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'LawnfeedClient' with '23' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'ILauncherClient' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'LauncherClientImpl' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class PreferenceImpl is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class BlurWallpaperProvider is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class BlurDrawable is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class LawnfeedClient is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class LauncherClientImpl is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

instances.message: This method is overloaded too many times.
This method is overloaded too many times.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface IPreferenceProvider is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface EditableItemInfo is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface ILauncherClient is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface IAllAppsThemer is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function upscaleToScreenSize is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function readMeta is nested too deeply.
Function restore is nested too deeply.
Function create is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: FunctionNaming

instances.message: Function names should match the pattern: ^([a-z$][a-zA-Z$0-9]*)|(`.*`)$

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: view.getTag(R.id.spring_animation_key) cannot be safely cast to SpringAnimation?.
view.getTag(R.id.spring_animation_key) cannot be safely cast to SpringAnimation.
i cannot be safely cast to String.

smells.name: UnconditionalJumpStatementInLoop
smells.description: An unconditional jump statement in a loop is useless. The loop itself is only executed once.

instances.message: This loop contains an unconditional jump expression which essentially renders it useless as it will exit the loop during the first iteration.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private function setFloat is unused.
Private property VERSION_INDEX is unused.
Private property context is unused.
Private property proxyPackage is unused.
Private property overlayEnabled is unused.

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class IconPackInfo defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class LauncherClientProxyConnection defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in ((current - min) / ((max - min) / steps)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (current - min) / ((max - min) / steps)
Parentheses in (useVerticalLayout && allAppsTheme !is AllAppsVerticalTheme) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: useVerticalLayout && allAppsTheme !is AllAppsVerticalTheme
Parentheses in (!useVerticalLayout && allAppsTheme is AllAppsVerticalTheme) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !useVerticalLayout && allAppsTheme is AllAppsVerticalTheme
Parentheses in (useCardTheme && popupTheme !is PopupCardTheme) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: useCardTheme && popupTheme !is PopupCardTheme
Parentheses in (!useCardTheme && popupTheme !is PopupBaseTheme) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !useCardTheme && popupTheme !is PopupBaseTheme
Parentheses in (secondLevel / 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: secondLevel / 60
Parentheses in (minuteLevel / 12) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: minuteLevel / 12
Parentheses in (width * scale) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: width * scale

Parentheses in (systemResField.get(null) === Resources.getSystem() && configResId != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: systemResField.get(null) === Resources.getSystem() && configResId != 0

Parentheses in (grantResults.isNotEmpty() && grantResults[0] == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: grantResults.isNotEmpty() && grantResults[0] == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED

Parentheses in (grantResults.isNotEmpty() && grantResults[0] == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: grantResults.isNotEmpty() && grantResults[0] == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of BlankActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of DrawableUtils.

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class DrawableUtils only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class AdaptiveIconProvider only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.

Function handleMessage has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function iconTextColor has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
